resources.string: Select genres that you don’t want to appear in your recommendations
At least 2 genres have to stay checked in order to provide recommendations. Your changes will not be saved.

You selected the following genres in both “Preferred genres” and “Excluded genres”:

%s

A genre can only be added to one of them, not both. Your changes will not be saved.
Select the genres that you want recommendations from
